title: Best of The Herd for Mar 12, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 12, 2020
description:
The NBA suspending the season was a correct and obvious decision to make

The NCAA should cancel their tournament

The NFL got lucky with the timing of this pandemic 

Guests: Shams Charania, Lead NBA Reporter for The Athletic & Stadium

Nick Wright, Host of FS1's First Things First

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
